headline.main: SFORZA FELICITATES BELGRADE ON REVOLT; Italian Ex-Foreign Minister, in Exile Here, Cables Good Wishes

lead_paragraph: Count Carlo Sforza, former Foreign Minister of Italy, now in exile in this country because of his anti-Fascist views, sent a cable yesterday to the new Foreign Minister of Yugoslavia, Momcilo Nincitch, commending the "heroic revolt" of Yugoslavia against domination by the Axis.
abstract: Count C Sforza hails Yugoslav stand, cable to Foreign Min Nincitch

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
